DataElement.preferredName: Past Integer::4 Week Adult Family Member Cancer Risk Anxiety Psychometrics Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the response to a QLAC question posed to an adult about worry over the past four weeks that family members were at risk of getting cancer. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated to support the Quality of Life in Adult Cancer Survivors Scale (QLAC), a validated psychometric measure developed by Dr. Nancy E. Avis

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The science of measuring "psychological" aspects of a person such as knowledge, skills, abilities, or personality.
